paper.title: Non-linear invariants for coloured Petri nets with interdependent tokens; application to the proof of parallel programs
paper.venue: Applications and Theory of Petri Nets
paper.abstract: We consider the way coloured Petri nets can be used as an abstract model for parallel programs. Then we present a kind of nets for which a large class of invariants can be proved directly on the structure of the net. We show, by means of examples, how these invariants can be used to establish partial correctness of programs.
